Message:
Now then, the list of things
I need to paint keeps
getting bigger, but I’ve got
nothing to paint them with.

Hmm... I’ll just crush
his bones and use them
as paint pigment then.

The picture’s only
gonna be one color,
but bear with it, okay?

This place has
no ethics or morals.
those are all of his colors.

I fill the canvas with different
shades and shadows,
chasing after the image
of him I have in my memory.

With what little materials
I have, I’ve only got one shot
to get this portrait right.

To engrave the life he once
lived with his own colors.

This portrait was never
intended for his funeral.
It’s really just for myself.

And so, as the all too familiar
sound of rain filled my ears,
I let my brush run free.
